name: SkyGuard
overview: SkyGuard LLC provides fleet management systems in the United States. It designs and develops SkyGuard, a fleet location and tracking system that collects, stores, and processes vehicle data, as well as delivers the information to fleet managers through a Website. The companyâ€™s SkyGuard also has various inputs and outputs that enable customers to monitor the vehicle’s systems. Its SkyGuard comprises a SkyRecovery unit that is based on global positioning satellite (GPS) and cellular technology for installation in the clientâ€™s vehicle; and a GPS telematics device and a Web-based application, which enables to track when and where a clientâ€™s vehicle was driven and for how many miles, what stops were made and were they idling at the time, and which client is driving recklessly or misusing the vehicles. SkyGuard LLC serves delivery, service, utility, construction and contractor, taxi and limousine, state and local government, public transportation, and school bus fleets, as well as enterprise, towing, plumbing/HVAC, equipment rental, and lawn/pest service industries. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Flowood, Mississippi. On April 10, 2009, SkyGuard LLC filed a voluntary petition for reorganization under Chapter 11 in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court for the Central District Of California, San Fernando Valley.
